TABLE.NAME: block_meter_stats
TABLE.COMMENT: Calculations for student activity each cron.

FIELD.NAME: mean
FIELD.COMMENT: The mean of student activity for this cron execution.

FIELD.NAME: stdv
FIELD.COMMENT: The standard deviation of the student activity on the cron execution.

FIELD.NAME: statstime
FIELD.COMMENT: The time of the report for the student activity for this cron execution.

FIELD.NAME: courseid
FIELD.COMMENT: The id of the course for this stats run.

TABLE.NAME: block_meter_studentstats
TABLE.COMMENT: The student score for each corresponding stats execution.

FIELD.NAME: statsid
FIELD.COMMENT: The id of the corresponding stats run.

FIELD.NAME: score
FIELD.COMMENT: The activity score of the student.
